product_name: Spy Dirty Mo Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Designed to Dale Earnhardt, Jr.'s exact specifications, the Spy Dirty Mo Polarized Sunglasses with Spy Happy Lens(TM) technology are your first-place trophy no matter how you finish. Bronze polarized lenses with black mirror finish cut glare, block 89% of visible light and block 100% of harmful UV rays. Spy Happy lenses tone down brightness without distorting colors, and are desinged to make you feel and perform better. Lenses are made of impact-resistant polycarbonate in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles. Lightweight nylon frames allow for an even weight distribution across the nose. Spy Dirty Mo Sunglasses feature a print of Dale Jr.'s signature inside.
short_description: Designed to Dale Earnhardt, Jr.'s exact specifications, the Spy Dirty Mo Polarized Sunglasses with Spy Happy Lens(TM) technology are your first-place trophy no matter how you finish.
